data.title: "Ford is shifting all North American small-car production from the U.S. to Mexico, CEO Mark Fields told investors today [14 September 2016] in Dearborn."

Despite tensions, US Navy’s top admiral says his Chinese counterparts “by and large” behave professionally, not provocatively, when the two nations meet at sea. And precisely because of tensions, Adm. Richardson said it’s all the more important to emphasize cooperating with China, not confronting it
